member.name: D3D10_SHADER_DEBUG_OUTPUTREG_INFO.OutputRegisterSet
member.summary: Must be D3D10_SHADER_DEBUG_REG_TEMP, D3D10_SHADER_DEBUG_REG_TEMPARRAY or D3D10_SHADER_DEBUG_REG_OUTPUT.

member.name: D3D10_SHADER_DEBUG_OUTPUTREG_INFO.OutputReg
member.summary: A value of -1 indicates no output.

member.name: D3D10_SHADER_DEBUG_OUTPUTREG_INFO.TempArrayReg
member.summary: If OutputRegisterSet is D3D10_SHADER_DEBUG_REG_TEMPARRAY this indicates which temp array.

member.name: D3D10_SHADER_DEBUG_OUTPUTREG_INFO.OutputComponents
member.summary: A value of -1 means the component is masked out.

member.name: D3D10_SHADER_DEBUG_OUTPUTREG_INFO.OutputVars
member.summary: Indicates which variable the instruction is writing per-component.

member.name: D3D10_SHADER_DEBUG_OUTPUTREG_INFO.IndexReg
member.summary: Offset from OutputReg of the element being written to. Used when writing to an indexable temp array or an output.

member.name: D3D10_SHADER_DEBUG_OUTPUTREG_INFO.IndexComp
member.summary: Offset from OutputReg of the element being written to. Used when writing to an indexable temp array or an output.
